thread.title: Tracy Morgan joins lineup for salute to Eddie Murphy
thread.title_full: Tracy Morgan joins lineup for salute to Eddie Murphy

title: Tracy Morgan joins lineup for salute to Eddie Murphy
text:
Actor Tracy Morgan arrives at the 67th Annual Primetime Emmy Awards Governors Ball at the Los Angeles Convention Center on September 20, 2015 in Los Angeles. (Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Images)
20 CONNECT 77 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Tracy Morgan is headed back to the stage.
The actor/comedian will be part of the star-studded lineup of performers to salute Eddie Murphy when he receives the Mark Twain Prize at the Kennedy Center in Washington on Oct. 18.
Morgan, Brittany Howard and George Lopez were added to the lineup Monday. Previously announced performers include Arsenio Hall, Chris Rock, Kathy Griffin, Dave Chappelle, Trevor Noah and Whitney Cummings.
USA TODAY
Arsenio to salute Murphy at Mark Twain Prize
The tribute show will be broadcast Nov. 23 on PBS.
USA TODAY
Eddie Murphy to receive Mark Twain Prize
